verses.verse: And the whole <S%H3605><s%> earth <S%H776><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> of one <S%H259><s%> language, <S%H8193><s%> and of one <S%H259><s%> speech. <S%H1697><s%>

And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> as they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from the east, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6924><s%> that they found <S%H4672><s%> a plain <S%H1237><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Shinar; <S%H8152><s%> and they dwelt <S%H3427><s%> there. <S%H8033><s%>

And they said <S%H559><s%> one <S%H376><s%> to <S%H413><s%> another, <S%H7453><s%> Go to, <S%H3051><s%> let us make <S%H3835><s%> brick, <S%H3843><s%> and burn <S%H8313><s%> them throughly. <S%H8316><s%> And they had <S%H1961><s%> brick <S%H3843><s%> for stone, <S%H68><s%> and slime <S%H2564><s%> had <S%H1961><s%> they for mortar. <S%H2563><s%>

And they said, <S%H559><s%> Go to, <S%H3051><s%> let us build <S%H1129><s%> us a city <S%H5892><s%> and a tower, <S%H4026><s%> whose top <S%H7218><s%> may reach unto heaven; <S%H8064><s%> and let us make <S%H6213><s%> us a name, <S%H8034><s%> lest <S%H6435><s%> we be scattered abroad <S%H6327><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of the whole <S%H3605><s%> earth. <S%H776><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came down <S%H3381><s%> to see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> and the tower, <S%H4026><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H120><s%> built. <S%H1129><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Behold, <S%H2005><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> is one, <S%H259><s%> and they have all <S%H3605><s%> one <S%H259><s%> language; <S%H8193><s%> and this <S%H2088><s%> they begin <S%H2490><s%> to do: <S%H6213><s%> and now <S%H6258><s%> nothing <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3605><s%> will be restrained <S%H1219><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> them, which <S%H834><s%> they have imagined <S%H2161><s%> to do. <S%H6213><s%>

Go to, <S%H3051><s%> let us go down, <S%H3381><s%> and there <S%H8033><s%> confound <S%H1101><s%> their language, <S%H8193><s%> that <S%H834><s%> they may not <S%H3808><s%> understand <S%H8085><s%> one <S%H376><s%> another's <S%H7453><s%> speech. <S%H8193><s%>

So the LORD <S%H3068><s%> scattered them abroad <S%H6327><s%> <S%H853><s%> from thence <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8033><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the earth: <S%H776><s%> and they left off <S%H2308><s%> to build <S%H1129><s%> the city. <S%H5892><s%>

Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> is the name <S%H8034><s%> of it called <S%H7121><s%> Babel; <S%H894><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> did there <S%H8033><s%> confound <S%H1101><s%> the language <S%H8193><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the earth: <S%H776><s%> and from thence <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8033><s%> did the LORD <S%H3068><s%> scatter them abroad <S%H6327><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are the generations <S%H8435><s%> of Shem: <S%H8035><s%> Shem <S%H8035><s%> was a hundred <S%H3967><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old, <S%H1121><s%> and begot <S%H3205><s%> <S%H853><s%> Arphaxad <S%H775><s%> two years <S%H8141><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the flood: <S%H3999><s%>

And Shem <S%H8035><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> after <S%H310><s%> he begot <S%H3205><s%> <S%H853><s%> Arphaxad <S%H775><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and begot <S%H3205><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters. <S%H1323><s%>
And Arphaxad <S%H775><s%> lived <S%H2425><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and begot <S%H3205><s%> <S%H853><s%> Salah: <S%H7974><s%>

And Arphaxad <S%H775><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> after <S%H310><s%> he begot <S%H3205><s%> <S%H853><s%> Salah <S%H7974><s%> four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and begot <S%H3205><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters. <S%H1323><s%>
And Salah <S%H7974><s%> lived <S%H2425><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and begot <S%H3205><s%> <S%H853><s%> Eber: <S%H5677><s%>

And Salah <S%H7974><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> after <S%H310><s%> he begot <S%H3205><s%> <S%H853><s%> Eber <S%H5677><s%> four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and begot <S%H3205><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters. <S%H1323><s%>
And Eber <S%H5677><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> four <S%H702><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and begot <S%H3205><s%> <S%H853><s%> Peleg: <S%H6389><s%>

And Eber <S%H5677><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> after <S%H310><s%> he begot <S%H3205><s%> <S%H853><s%> Peleg <S%H6389><s%> four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and begot <S%H3205><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters. <S%H1323><s%>
And Peleg <S%H6389><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and begot <S%H3205><s%> <S%H853><s%> Reu: <S%H7466><s%>

And Peleg <S%H6389><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> after <S%H310><s%> he begot <S%H3205><s%> <S%H853><s%> Reu <S%H7466><s%> two hundred <S%H3967><s%> and nine <S%H8672><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and begot <S%H3205><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters. <S%H1323><s%>
And Reu <S%H7466><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and begot <S%H3205><s%> <S%H853><s%> Serug: <S%H8286><s%>

And Reu <S%H7466><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> after <S%H310><s%> he begot <S%H3205><s%> <S%H853><s%> Serug <S%H8286><s%> two hundred <S%H3967><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and begot <S%H3205><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters. <S%H1323><s%>
And Serug <S%H8286><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and begot <S%H3205><s%> <S%H853><s%> Nahor: <S%H5152><s%>

And Serug <S%H8286><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> after <S%H310><s%> he begot <S%H3205><s%> <S%H853><s%> Nahor <S%H5152><s%> two hundred <S%H3967><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and begot <S%H3205><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters. <S%H1323><s%>
And Nahor <S%H5152><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> nine <S%H8672><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and begot <S%H3205><s%> <S%H853><s%> Terah: <S%H8646><s%>

And Nahor <S%H5152><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> after <S%H310><s%> he begot <S%H3205><s%> <S%H853><s%> Terah <S%H8646><s%> a hundred <S%H3967><s%> and nineteen <S%H8672><s%> <S%H6240><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and begot <S%H3205><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters. <S%H1323><s%>

And Terah <S%H8646><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> seventy <S%H7657><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and begot <S%H3205><s%> <S%H853><s%> Abram, <S%H87><s%> <S%H853><s%> Nahor, <S%H5152><s%> and Haran. <S%H2039><s%>

Now these <S%H428><s%> are the generations <S%H8435><s%> of Terah: <S%H8646><s%> Terah <S%H8646><s%> begot <S%H3205><s%> <S%H853><s%> Abram, <S%H87><s%> <S%H853><s%> Nahor, <S%H5152><s%> and Haran; <S%H2039><s%> and Haran <S%H2039><s%> begot <S%H3205><s%> <S%H853><s%> Lot. <S%H3876><s%>

And Haran <S%H2039><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> before <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> his father <S%H1><s%> Terah <S%H8646><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of his nativity, <S%H4138><s%> in Ur <S%H218><s%> of the Chaldees. <S%H3778><s%>

And Abram <S%H87><s%> and Nahor <S%H5152><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> them wives: <S%H802><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of Abram's <S%H87><s%> wife <S%H802><s%> was Sarai; <S%H8297><s%> and the name <S%H8034><s%> of Nahor's <S%H5152><s%> wife, <S%H802><s%> Milcah, <S%H4435><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Haran, <S%H2039><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of Milcah, <S%H4435><s%> and the father <S%H1><s%> of Iscah. <S%H3252><s%>
But Sarai <S%H8297><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> barren; <S%H6135><s%> she had no <S%H369><s%> child. <S%H2056><s%>

And Terah <S%H8646><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> Abram <S%H87><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> and Lot <S%H3876><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Haran <S%H2039><s%> his son's <S%H1121><s%> son, <S%H1121><s%> and Sarai <S%H8297><s%> his daughter-in-law, <S%H3618><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%> Abram's <S%H87><s%> wife; <S%H802><s%> and they went forth <S%H3318><s%> with <S%H854><s%> them from Ur <S%H4480><s%> <S%H218><s%> of the Chaldees, <S%H3778><s%> to go <S%H1980><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan; <S%H3667><s%> and they came <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> Haran, <S%H2771><s%> and dwelt <S%H3427><s%> there. <S%H8033><s%>

And the days <S%H3117><s%> of Terah <S%H8646><s%> were <S%H1961><s%> two hundred <S%H3967><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> years: <S%H8141><s%> and Terah <S%H8646><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> in Haran. <S%H2771><s%>
